0:
- job_name: node-exporter
  scrape_interval: 1m
  scrape_timeout: 10s
  honor_timestamps: true
  static_configs:
    - targets:
        - "opnsense.${PRIVATE_DOMAIN}:9100"

until [ -f /snapshots/kopia.repository.f ]; do
    printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "Waiting for the Kopia repo to become ready ..."
    sleep 1
done
Welcome to Bryan's Ark Server - Map: Extinction

[/Script/ShooterGame.ShooterGameUserSettings]
Version=5
AlwaysAllowStructurePickUp=True
[ServerSettings]
AllowFlyerCarryPvE=True
AllowThirdPersonPlayer=True
XPMultiplier={{ .server.xpMultiplier }}
allowThirdPersonPlayer=1
AllowCaveBuildingPvE=1
alwaysNotifyPlayerJoined=1
alwaysNotifyPlayerLeft=1
bAllowFlyerCarryPvE=1
bDisableStructureDecayPvE=1
DinoCharacterHealthRecoveryMultiplier=2.00000
DinoCharacterStaminaDrainMultiplier=0.50000
DinoCharacterFoodDrainMultiplier=0.25
HarvestAmountMultiplier=1.50000
TamingSpeedMultiplier=8.00000
DifficultyOffset=1.00000
OverrideOfficialDifficulty=5.00000
AllowAnyoneBabyImprintCuddle=1
[AutoTrough]
NoInventory=True
[StructuresPlus]
EnableEngramOverride=true
AdditionalSupportDistanceInFoundations=10
BunkBedCooldownTimeInSeconds=60
AllowDynamicPillarNonFoundationSupport=True
AllowDynamicPillarSupport=True
[ArkAutomatedSettings]
KitchenModActive=True
[AwesomeSpyGlass]
AllowStructureTargeting=False
AllowOutline=False

#!/bin/bash
DELTA_CORE=2.4.0
DELTA_VERSION=3.0.0
SCALA_VERSION=2.13

echo 'downloading delta lake files'
apt install -y wget
wget https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/io/delta/delta-core_$SCALA_VERSION/$DELTA_CORE/delta-core_$SCALA_VERSION-$DELTA_CORE.jar -P /opt/spark/jars
wget https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/io/delta/delta-storage/$DELTA_VERSION/delta-storage-$DELTA_VERSION.jar -P $SPARK_DIR/jars/

echo 'download complete'
exit 0
